about_the_game:
About the Game:

Honey Peach Clicker is a clicker game, which you can keep click the honey peach to relieves stress, and watch the score continues to increase.
And also, Honey Peach Coin (HPC) dropped every Three hours when game is running.
Every Three HPC consume can pull for a random community inventory item.
Let's enjoy the growth of your collection!

*Item pool will be replaced every 21 days*


Features:

Pixel Honey Peach.
Items collection.
Exchange function, exchange HPC to random items!


Item Acquisition Rate:

  • Common: 50% (Total 5 items, replace every two item pool period: 42 days)
  • Rare: 40% (Total 4 items)
  • Epic: 9.5% (Total 3 items)
  • Legendary: 0.49% (Total 2 items)
  • Heirloom: 0.01% (Only 1 item)

Honey Peach Clicker is a clicker game, which you can keep click the honey peach to relieves stress, and watch the score continues to increase.
And also, Honey Peach Coin (HPC) dropped every Three hours when game is running.
Every Three HPC consume can pull for a random community inventory item.
Let's enjoy the growth of your collection!

short_description: Honey Peach Clicker is a Clicker game, which you can keep click the honey peach to Relieves stress. And also, Honey Peach Coin (HPC) will drop after a period of time while the game runing. HPC can be used to exchange special items to Enrich your community inventory collection!
